staging_note: Entities written to reports/kg-entities/ staging area. Target 07_system/knowledge-graph/entities/ is root-owned and not writable by nitara user. Files must be moved by root or permissions fixed: sudo chown -R nitara:nitara /srv/focus-flow/07_system/knowledge-graph/

contradictions.conflict: Portfolio analysis (2026-02-18) recommends PARK for Bramha ESG — do not build. Network analysis (2026-02-19) generates multiple active investment opportunities for Bramha ESG: Climate Week Zurich sponsorship (CHF 2-5K), ecoinvent data partnership, Rodolphe Bocquet outreach. These actions presuppose active investment, which contradicts the PARK recommendation.
contradictions.resolution: Not a true contradiction — PARK applies to the build decision (do not code/ship a product), while the network outreach activities are validation and market discovery actions that are appropriate even for PARKED projects. However, the distinction should be explicit in the product strategy. Left for meta agent to clarify.
